[[Image:Caras Galadhon, Lunds Tolkiensällskap.png|<small>Logo of Caras Galadhon, Lunds Tolkiensällskap</small>|thumb]]
'''Caras Galadhon, Lunds Tolkiensällskap''' is the Swedish Tolkien Society of [[wikipedia:Lund|Lund]]. The members of the association, who mainly consist of students and staff at the [[wikipedia:Lund University|Lund University]], assume the role of a character in the [[legendarium]] of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], and meet for parties and other social gatherings (such as studies of the languages and works created by Tolkien, gaming, dancing, etc.).
